data.title: It's my "Go To" for good Ice Cream
data.text: I come here because I know they will have what I want. Good Ice Cream. For a long time I was hooked on the "world class chocolate" On my word... I was hooked... Like every week I had to get one of those gallon/pint thingies! The butter pecan is excellent too. But my "go to" which I usually get all the time is the vanilla. They used to have a really good one with 3 types of vanillas mixed in but they got rid of it, I think. Customer service is always great too! It's open late which makes for the perfect late night snack spot. Oh and I love, love, love their VANILLA SHAKE!!! It's make very simple with ice cream and milk.. that's it! LOVE IT!
